Prerequisite(s): None
Range: Close (25 ft. + 5ft./2 levels)
Target: One creature
Duration: 1 round

Description

It's not nice to play with your food, but that never stopped you. Upon initiating this boost, select one opponent with the tricked condition within range. The next successful attack within 1 round against them deals an extra 3 damage per round of the tricked condition they have remaining at the time you initiated this boost, to a maximum of 3 times your initiator level. Exploit: The maximum limit of extra damage is doubled, to 6 times your initiator level. Upon using this exploit, the target is immune to this exploit for two rounds.
